        Description copied from interface: ActionGenerator
        Generates a map of actions, where each object is indexed by the MD5 hash of its json string representation.
        Specified by:
        generateActions in interface ActionGenerator
        Parameters:
        game - as the game instance for which the
        player - as the player object defining the participant for why tha action bundle shall be created. Can be null, if en empty actions set must be generated for an observer who does not actively participate in the game.
